title: Passed the SAT Test
description: In January 2020, I received my SAT results, which were 1580 out of 1600. I received 800 in math and 780 in English.

title: Graduated High School
description: I completed high school with a GPA of 4 out of 4.

title: Enrolled in College
description: In October 2020, I got admitted to study computer science focusing in Software Engineering at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia.

title: Won my First Hackathon
description: Participated in and won first place in the renowned Microsoft APAC AI Hackathon.

title: Landed my First Internship
description: In September 2023, I entered the industrial field as an intern with Micro semiconductor Sdn Bhd., where I learned a lot about how the industries work.

title: Graduated University
description: In July 2024, I finally graduated from university with a GPA of 3.79 out of 4.
